author: Tony Abou-Ganim
description: Apricot liqueur flavours and sweetens this tasty riff on a classic Bourbon Julep.
name: Apricot Julep
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Giffard Abricot du Roussillon liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE apricot in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into cup half filled with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) the drink with the crushed ice using a bar spoon
Top up with more crushed ice and CHURN again
Repeat this process so the drink fills the cup and frost forms on the outside

video.description: Apricot liqueur flavours and sweetens this tasty riff on a classic Bourbon Julep.
video.name: HOWTO make Apricot Julep
